info.female_impression: Is it just me... or does Grace sound just like a human talking to a cat whenever she's talking to machines?
info.male_impression:
You mean the way you talk to cats, right?
More importantly, is Fairy already thinking about philosophical questions like "Who am I?"
info.outlook_desc:
New Eridu Citizen Verification Profile Info:
Hollow Investigator — Grace, possessing good Ether aptitude, is allowed to perform basic tasks like investigating and extracting resources in known Hollows within the city (including Companion Hollows).
Note: Prolonged exposure to machinery in Ether environments could impact personal health, so please be mindful.
info.profile_desc:
Grace is a technical expert at Belobog Industries. She's the core talent in developing and patenting Belobog's in-Hollow machinery.
She's obsessed with gears, metal and wires — a true mechanical geek. She's eager to dismantle and study any machinery or equipment she takes an interest in: "Such sharp and strong lines, truly beautiful... I can't help but want to open it up and take a look."

Grace always shows extraordinary patience when dealing with machines, doting on the sophisticated metal constructions as if they were her own children.
According to the information at hand, Grace is probably the only one who can playfully refer to Koleda as "Sweet Pea" without receiving a kick in the shin.
Question: Based on Grace's understanding of machines, would she consider me one? I'm currently lacking a physical form, however, so I don't possess components like gears, metal, or wires.

mindscape_cinemas.name: Recharge Chamber
mindscape_cinemas.description:
When the 4th hit of Grace's Basic Attack hits an enemy, all squad members gain 0.25 Energy.
Within the same move, this effect can grant a max of 2 Energy to all squad members.
mindscape_cinemas.description2: Efficiency is the lifeblood of engineering, and within Grace's gun barrel resonates its heartbeat.

mindscape_cinemas.name: Lightning Piercer
mindscape_cinemas.description: When Grace's thrown grenade hits an enemy during a Basic Attack, Special Attack, or EX Special Attack, the target's Electric RES is reduced by 8.5%, and Electric Anomaly Buildup RES is reduced by 8.5%, lasting for 8s.
mindscape_cinemas.description2:
"Dissecting" complex mechanical structures is Grace's greatest hobby, even in the midst of battle.
How does it feel to get taken apart, with every vulnerability laid bare?

mindscape_cinemas.name: Chief Mechanic
mindscape_cinemas.description: Basic Attack, Dodge, Assist, Special Attack, and Chain Attack Lv. +2
mindscape_cinemas.description2:
Grace was personally involved in writing the "Belobog Industries' Construction Safety Guidelines."
She's also the employee who violated the "no dangerous explosives at construction sites" policy the most times.

mindscape_cinemas.name: Burst Capacitor
mindscape_cinemas.description: When Grace uses her EX Special Attack, she gains 6 stacks of Charge (max 6 stacks). When her Basic Attack or Dash Attack hits an enemy, 1 stack of Charge is consumed, increasing her Energy Generation Rate of the attack by 20%.
mindscape_cinemas.description2:
Anton suspected within the component Grace referred to as the "Electropulse Recycling Module," there was, in fact, an Ether hamster tirelessly generating energy around the clock.
"Can you equip my bro with one too?"

mindscape_cinemas.name: "Frosty Cold Iron Witch"
mindscape_cinemas.description: Basic Attack, Dodge, Assist, Special Attack, and Chain Attack Lv. +2
mindscape_cinemas.description2: The "Frosty Cold Iron Witch" is capable of taming any mechanical beast, or at least that's what the anonymous fan who came up with the name thinks.

mindscape_cinemas.name: Detonation Trigger
mindscape_cinemas.description: When all Zap stacks are consumed to activate a Special Attack or EX Special Attack, Grace's skill is enhanced, tossing an extra grenade and increasing each grenade's DMG to 200%.
mindscape_cinemas.description2:
The average blood temperature of Belobog Heavy Industries' employees is ninety-eight degrees Celsius. Grace is often viewed as the safety valve keeping them all from boiling.
When even Grace gives up control, it's a sign for everyone to cover their ears.

descriptions.name: Basic Attack: High-Pressure Spike
descriptions.description:
Press  to activate:
Unleashes up to 4 attacks, dealing Physical DMG and Electric DMG.
While launching Basic Attacks, drag the stick/joystick to attack while moving. This allows Grace to reposition herself and deal Physical DMG.
While Grace is launching Basic Attacks, her Basic Attack combo will not be interrupted by her Special Attacks, EX Special Attacks, Dodge, Dash Attacks, or Dodge Counter.

descriptions.name: Dodge: Safety Regulation
descriptions.description:
Press  to activate:
A quick dash dodge.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

descriptions.name: Dash Attack: Quick Inspection
descriptions.description:
Press  during a dodge to activate:
Slide forward while shooting, dealing Physical DMG.

descriptions.name: Dodge Counter: Violation Penalty
descriptions.description:
Press  during a Perfect Dodge to activate:
Throws a grenade at enemies, dealing Electric DMG.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

descriptions.name: Special Attack: Obstruction Removal
descriptions.description:
Press  to activate:
Throws a grenade to the front, dealing Electric DMG.
Upon use, drag the stick/joystick to change directions.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

descriptions.name: EX Special Attack: Supercharged Obstruction Removal
descriptions.description:
With enough Energy, press  to activate:
Leap in the air and throw two grenades to the front, dealing massive Electric DMG.
Upon use, drag the stick/joystick to change directions.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

descriptions.name: EX Special Attack: Supercharged Obstruction Removal
Chain Attack: Collaborative Construction
descriptions.description:
When a Chain Attack is triggered, select the character to activate:
Throws three grenades into the air then strafes to detonate them, dealing massive Electric DMG.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

descriptions.name: Ultimate: Demolition Blast - Beware
descriptions.description:
When Decibel Rating is at Maximum, press  to activate:
Throws a custom grenade which explodes in the air and splits into four smaller grenades, dealing massive Electric DMG.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

descriptions.name: Quick Assist: Incident Management
descriptions.description:
When the active character is launched in the air, press  to activate:
Throws a grenade at the enemy, dealing Electric DMG.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

descriptions.name: Evasive Assist: Rapid Risk Response
descriptions.description:
When the character on field is about to be attacked, press  to activate:
Dodges the enemy's attack and activates Vital View.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

descriptions.name: Assist Follow-Up: Counter Volt Needle
descriptions.description:
Press  after an Evasive Assist to activate:
Unleashes a spinning hail of bullets against enemies in front and throws a grenade, dealing Electric DMG.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

descriptions: When Grace's Basic Attack or Dash Attack hits an enemy and deals Physical DMG, she gains 1 stack of Zap (up to 8 stacks). Upon reaching maximum stacks, using a Special Attack or EX Special Attack will consume all stacks of Zap, increasing the accumulated Electric Anomaly Buildup by 65%.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
Upon hitting an enemy with an EX Special Attack, the next Shock effect inflicted on the target increases Shock DMG by 18%. This effect can stack up to 2 times, and each enemy can trigger it once per skill use. Resets when the Shock effect ends.
